title: Ticket #3743: condor_q -dag doesn't use a projection to query job ads
description: when -dag is passed to condor_q, the projection on the query to the schedd for job ads is removed. This means that condor_q will request ALL of the job attributes when -dag is passed, which makes -dag very slow by comparison to other uses of condor_q. See the commit and comments on #3578 for more details.
creator: johnkn
